component.name: Mtribes
component.script:
function init() broker = createObject("roSGNode", "MTBroker") client = createObject("roSGNode", "MTClient") collections = createObject("roSGNode", "ContentNode")
broker.callFunc("constructor") client.callFunc("constructor", {apiKey:"6ce409e6860440b18f581233cd41b4ca", fallbacks: MTFallbacks(), broker: broker})
homepage = createObject("roSGNode", "HomepageCollection") homepage.callFunc("constructor", {id:"wN23m6l", childIds: ["8x6DeEy", "yxE8Q2R"], broker: broker})
collections.update({ homepage: homepage }, true)
m.top.setFields({ id: "mtribes" client: client session: client.session collections: collections })
m.global.addField("mtribes", "node", false) m.global.mtribes = m.top end function
